name: PUT_FLD
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the EXPORT/IMPORT commands.

parameters.name: fieldname
parameters.description: This is the field that will be added to the end of the non-TAS file buffer. The command will use the active OPNO file. If you are initializing the buffer then don't put a field name here.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Put Field In Buffer.
